titleStmt.title: Reflections upon the bulls of the Popes Paul the Third and Pius the Fifth emitted against King Henry the 8 and Queen Elizabeth of England.
titleStmt.author: Philotheus.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Includes errata on p. 12 at end.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
